    "</div>"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "##### Read ROI from photoshop PSD files"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "##### import mdl package"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import os\n",
    "import sys\n",
    "sys.path.append(os.path.abspath('../../../../'))\n",
    "import mdl"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "##### set paths"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "image_path = '/Users/mdl-admin/Desktop/roi/raw/'\n",
    "output_path = '/Users/mdl-admin/Desktop/roi/output/'\n",
    "metadata_source = '/Users/mdl-admin/Desktop/roi/metadata.xlsx'"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "##### initiate"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "roi = mdl.eyetracking.ROI(isMultiprocessing=True, isDebug=True, \n",
    "\timage_path=image_path, output_path=output_path, metadata_source=metadata_source, \n",
    "\tscale=1, screensize=[1920,1080], center=[(1920*.25),(1080*.25)], shape='straight', \n",
    "\troi_format='both', roicolumn=\"feature\", uuid=None, newcolumn={'position': 'bottom'})"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "##### start"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "df, error = roi.process()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": []
